column1: Herumor was a Black Númenóreans who lived in the late Second Age. After the Downfall of Númenor he
column3: rose to power among the Haradrim and served Sauron.

column1: Herumor means "Black Lord" in Quenya (from heru = "lord" and morë = "dark").
In the defunct Middle-earth Role Playing game from the 1980s
column2: Herumor is given an extended history. Fuinur is then his older brother. J.R.R. Tolkien
column4: had nothing to do with writing this history.
